AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled in relation to Maria De Jesus Garcia's case, potentially hidden in a pickup truck camper with fogged windows, appearing unwashed and unkempt, including Mexican citizens and illegal aliens found during an immigration inspection on Interstate Highway 35, exhibiting efforts to avoid detection, described as dirty appearing Hispanic-descended workmen, attempting to hide by moving and slouching low, scrambling around to get out of the light, taking actions such as ducking and scrambling or slouching and hunkering down in response to being observed
